message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $18,000.  I think it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is already a very competitive price. I could meet you halfway at $16,000, which is a significant discount from my initial offer.

Thank you for your response, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I still believe that $14,000 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
